Class NumeralConverterModel

java.lang.Object
NumeralConverterModel
public class NumeralConverterModel
extends java.lang.Object
model class with static methods to be called by controller to change from roman numerals to arabic and vice verse

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private static java.lang.String[] hundreds
    string array holding the hundreds values of the roman numerals, 100, 200, ........, 9000
    private static java.lang.String[] tens
    string array holding the tens values of the roman numerals, 10,20,.....,90
    private static java.lang.String thousands
    string holding the thousand value in roman numeral
    private static java.lang.String[] units
    string array holding the unit values of the roman numerals, from 1 to 9

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    NumeralConverterModel()
    no argument constructor with no process in it since no object of this class is instantiated

  • Method Summary

    static java.lang.String convertArabicToRoman​(java.lang.String Arabic)
    method to convert from arabic to roman numerals
    static java.lang.String convertRomanToArabic​(java.lang.String romanNumeral)
    method to convert roman numeral to arabic

  • Method Details

    • convertArabicToRoman

      public static java.lang.String convertArabicToRoman​(java.lang.String Arabic) throws java.lang.Exception
      method to convert from arabic to roman numerals
      Parameters:
      Arabic - string holding the value to transform to roman
      Returns:
      string holding the roman numeral equivalent
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - when the arabic numeral is invalid

    • convertRomanToArabic

      public static java.lang.String convertRomanToArabic​(java.lang.String romanNumeral) throws java.lang.Exception
      method to convert roman numeral to arabic
      Parameters:
      romanNumeral - roamn numeral to be converted to arabic
      Returns:
      string holding the arabic numeral equivalent
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - whenever conversion could not occur because passed in roman numeral is invalid
